TestCaseMetaData.name: Initial Load
TestCaseMetaData.Description: The initial Laboratory Test Compendium is delivered electronically from the LIS to the EHR-S. The EHR will integrate the eDOS into its test directory and use it to allow placement of orders electronically. The initial laboratory test compendium is composed of up to five messages.
TestCaseMetaData.PostCondition: Data elements are incorporated appropriately into the EHR-S
TestCaseMetaData.TestObjectives: Demonstrate capability to support typically and maximally populated messages including repeating elements for all supported test types.
TestCaseMetaData.Notes: Initial load of compendium information testing all supported data elements including repeats. This is using replace messages, so all data in these messages will replace information from a previous eDOS upload
TestCaseMetaData.Comments: Initial upload for a new compendium.
